name: 11x11 Block Puzzle - Brain Teasers of Classic Dots Jewel Color 10/10 Plus Game
name_original: 11x11 Block Puzzle - Brain Teasers of Classic Dots Jewel Color 10/10 Plus Game
description: 11x11 Block Puzzle is your next FREE block challenging puzzle game and its simple to play with lots of fun. Simply place the different blocks shapes on the 11x11 grid board, fill up rows or columns to clear all blocks vertically or horizontally. Gain maximum point by placing each blocks wisely on the grid and top the leaderboard. No time limit to this game, so its endless.
